metadata.name: Code Review Tasks
metadata.description: Pre-defined tasks for code review and pull request workflows
metadata.author: tacosontitan

templates.title: Create Draft PR
templates.description: Create a draft pull request to initiate the code review process.

templates.title: Self-Review PR
templates.description: Perform a self-review of the pull request to ensure code quality and completeness.

templates.title: Publish PR
templates.description: Publish the pull request for review by other team members.

templates.title: Run PR Validations
templates.description: Run automated validations for the pull request to ensure compliance with standards.

templates.title: Resolve PR Feedback
templates.description: Address feedback provided during the pull request review process.

templates.title: Complete PR
templates.description: Complete the pull request after all validations and reviews are successful.
